html:
11.9.22  9:45 am   hey bill, as someone who is also a musician, do you have any advice for whenever someone is having a hard time writing music? thanks -nj

      temporarily suspend the requirement that it must be "good". it's like when you encounter a road block, temporarily drive off the road to get around it, and you will be back on the road soon, with the added bonus of having some grass on the tires, which adds character

11.9.22  9:36 am   is that important to have friends?

     it seems like it should be

     why

      get that second opinion. or sometimes get a first opinion and then you can go second

11.9.22  8:18 am   what is your favorite part of being a musician?

      the music

11.9.22  6:40 am   does pineapple belong on pizza

      pineapple belongs inside the pizza

11.9.22  5:58 am   are potatoes good?

      they are the only thing that's good

11.9.22  3:35 am   will you ever do a talk show sketch?

      it would probably take a lot of restraint for me to not do only talk show sketches all the time

11.9.22  12:47 am   Is Nightmare Before Christmas a Christmas movie or a Halloween movie?

      it's both

11.8.22  11:33 pm   is squidward nose real?

      no

11.8.22  10:30 pm   which is better: irish punk rock or french edm

      i can't tell the difference

11.8.22  10:01 pm   Thoughts on poodles

      the godzilla of dogs

11.8.22  9:39 pm   What do you think of people that are 5'5

      i wouldn't really know what to think, until i know a little more about them

11.8.22  8:49 pm   thoughts on songs with 2 titles (i.e. good riddance (time of your life))

      sometimes that's the only way. in this case i can imagine why: "time of your life" obviously feels like the title lyric, when you listen to the song. but, on paper, the title "time of your life" probably looks like a party song or something, and doesn't look like a sort of goodbye song. so there was probably a need to convey the goodbye vibe in the title. also, sometimes songs with non-lyric titles might add the more obvious lyric title in parentheses later, if the song becomes a hit. for recognizability. On the other hand, sometimes parentheses may be just used for fun

11.8.22  7:48 pm   What are your thoughts on pineapples?

      i'll believe it when i see it

11.8.22  7:14 pm   Tell me a joke

      every time i try to tell a joke i end up accidentally telling the truth

11.8.22  7:14 pm   Was "maybe i could eat blades of grass" more like an interview , a q&a, or both?

      sort of like a freestyle

11.8.22  7:03 pm   my hands are super cold. what do i do

      start giving out cold handshakes

11.8.22  4:25 pm   How vague is the appropriate amount of vague

      'middle of the road'

11.8.22  2:46 pm   Ever worn the world as a hat

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

11.8.22  2:28 pm   Are you actually tall and handsome as mentioned in corner store?

      let me check

11.8.22  1:47 pm   The moving wall caused me to forget too much of my past, what do I do

      go ahead and start remembering the future

11.8.22  1:26 pm   do you ever look at your room and go "wow, i can't work here today" ?

     yes

      if so, do you work there anyway or go somewhere else?

     might clean it up

11.8.22  1:05 pm   hello 

      hi

11.8.22  1:01 pm   Why is everything so dumb and stupid?

      due to intelligence

11.8.22  10:25 am   where can you buy 200 gallons of nacho cheese to stand on top of a skyscraper and pour it onto unsuspecting people below

      in America

11.8.22  9:57 am   tips on writing a poem?

      do a bad one first. someone's gotta do it

11.8.22  9:07 am   What was the humming in the beginning of "out to lunch?" Was he humming an old song of yours or something you're making right now?

      improvised in the vocal booth. not significant. "casual humming" is what i would call that. in fact, here's the 2 different versions

11.8.22  6:56 am   What was your inspiration for 2 friends on the beach?

      the idea of 2 friends being somewhere

11.8.22  3:09 am   in your opinion, how flat is the average shoe?

      i would estimtate that the average flatness, as measured by the distance between the highest and lowest point of the sole on an individual shoe, amongst all shoes ever made, would be about .4 centimeters

11.7.22  11:02 pm   what was the inspiration behind "2 friends on the beach"

      the title. and the inspiration behind the title was the desire to write. using the technique of just putting 2 characters somewhere and see where it goes

11.7.22  10:55 pm   are the juggling clubs still on the celing

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

11.7.22  10:02 pm   Do you think that bring a musician (particularly someone with a drum background) has made your foley skills stronger?

     yes

      Or is foley a whole different ball game from music? 

     it's similar

11.7.22  9:19 pm   i have this ginormous personal project that im working on as a hobby. do you have any tips

      it sounds like you are doing pretty good

11.7.22  9:18 pm   do u have a newsletter or something i can sign up for

      no

11.7.22  9:02 pm   U gonna make a song abt Christmas?

      i've done that

11.7.22  8:49 pm   hey, i'm just finishing writing a short story, but can't seem to figure out how to end the story in a way that wraps it up well. Any ideas?

      just keep it going. don't end it

11.7.22  7:43 pm   what is the little roll into a snare hit called?

     it might be called a "ruff"

     What is a good way to imitate that purely with midi and samples?

     well, one way is to just get a recording (sample) of someone actually playing that. but the problem there is, it's not very 'playable' for you because you won't have good control over when the final attack is. so if you want something usable, you'll want a steady sample of a continuous drum roll, with fast attack and fast release, so it starts and stops immediately when you press or lift the key, and then you'll want a separate sample, on another key, for a normal snare hit. and then you can play both keys to time the ruffs any way you want. And of course, for decent results, you'll want to make them both dynamic sensitive, and have many different versions of the sample, for different loudness levels, and also many different versions for the same loudness level, so they don't all sound identical

11.7.22  7:25 pm   what's up bill, why am i wanna be unhappy/miserable? many people said that i don't know what is like to be not joyful, but sure thing i do because of my past. i don't have friends and that feeling of loneliness and depression for some reason giving me pleasure. looking at others, seeing how they living their life giving me pain but.. i like it and i want more. what should i do in the future, should i fix myself (2) or just keep being like that? will it cause some serious problems or it's gonna be even better?

      have you thought of becoming a poet, or one of the many modern day versions of a poet

11.7.22  6:30 pm   how to make better days (than the days i had previously)

      go ahead and have a less than average day, then that will make it extremely likely that the next ones after that will be better

11.7.22  5:30 pm   who wins ham or burger

      it's the city of Hamburg

11.7.22  4:32 pm   What nut is used to make "Nutella"?

      hazel

11.7.22  4:22 pm   can i listen to christmas now?

      sure

11.7.22  2:22 pm   any tips for a lazy artist with too much freedom?

      how about getting a job

11.7.22  2:00 pm   If the sun makes us warm the what does the moon make us feel

      loved

11.7.22  1:54 pm   how did you learn 3d design

      it's an emotional roller coaster, back and forth between feeling like i can do everything and feeling like i can't do anything. which continues to this day, probably for most 3D artists

11.7.22  1:24 pm   What does it feel like to go in the corner store

      probably cozy and overwhelming. that store is very tightly packed with products. probably about twice as much as i was able to depict

11.7.22  12:53 pm   what instrument/soundfont did you use in might quit from 1:53-1:56 and 2:01-2:03?

      that's a synth sound i made. it's called "delhi", which i assume is because it was first designed during the making of the "history of the entire world" score, perhaps during a part dealing with delhi, where it probably sounds different because the selections you mentioned are using it at a much lower octave

11.7.22  12:23 pm   what's your opinion on baguettes

      makes me wonder about its larger cousin, the bague

11.7.22  11:58 am   what is the difference of a tub full of water and a sea full of water?

      the difference just about amounts to the entire sea. the tub is negligible in comparison

11.7.22  11:55 am   can you give me some perspective please

      sure

11.7.22  9:26 am   how do you talk to people?

      i have no idea, but that's what makes it so much fun
